conversion_verification.notes: Successful volumetric 3D transformation with clearly defined wall heights and cutaway view.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D geometry; wall thickness and corners are well-defined. Projection is a clean isometric-style view.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Strong layout fidelity. Pantry, stairs, and room partitions align well. Minor length shifts in the dining extension.

interior_elements.notes: Kitchen island and fixtures are well-placed. Dining table and living furniture added logically following the plan's labels.

visual_clarity.notes: High contrast and clean rendering. No UI contamination. Shadows aid depth perception.

detected_errors.description: Some window openings on the left side are rendered as solid wall indents rather than transparent/framed openings.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that preserves the architectural complexity of the floor plan with faithful furniture placement.
